com.daw.pms.Service.QQMusic

Interface QQMusicMVService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QQMusicMVServiceImpl

    public interface QQMusicMVService
    Service for handle mv in ncm.
    Since:
    7/28/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QQMusicDetailVideo getDetailMV(String vid, String cookie)
      Get detail video information according to its mvid.
      Map<String,List<String>> getMVsLink(String vids, String cookie)
      Get the url for the mv(s) vids.
      List<BasicVideo> getRelatedVideos(Integer songId, String cookie)
      Get all the related basic videos information according to its songId.

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailMV

        QQMusicDetailVideo getDetailMV(String vid,
                               String cookie)
        Get detail video information according to its mvid.
        Parameters:
        vid - The vid of the mv.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        The detail information of the mv vid.
        API Note:
        GET /mv?id=vid

      • getMVsLink

        Map<String,List<String>> getMVsLink(String vids,
                                    String cookie)
        Get the url for the mv(s) vids.
        Parameters:
        vids - The vid of the mv, multi vid separated by comma.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        A map which key is the vid and value is a list of urls of this mv.
        API Note:
        GET /mv/url?id=vids

      • getRelatedVideos

        List<BasicVideo> getRelatedVideos(Integer songId,
                                  String cookie)
        Get all the related basic videos information according to its songId.
        Parameters:
        songId - The song's id.
        cookie - Your qq music cookie.
        Returns:
        A list of basic video information related to the song.
